Question: In 1984 this person bought a very early copy of Magna Carta, one of only a few to leave the United Kingdom.
Hints: In the 1986 miniseries, this person was portrayed by Richard Crenna.
By late 1954, this person was made a lieutenant, junior grade.
This person denounced Congress for its inaction in his speech at the National Press Club in Washington, D.C., on March 18, 1992.
